response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled performance and quality. We believe its value extends far beyond its physical attributes, making it an investment worth considering. We understand that the true value of this product may resonate differently with each individual, but we are confident that you will find it to be a worthwhile addition to your collection or business. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 18000}
